! Cisco FTD High Availability/Failover Configuration
! Based on "Configure FTD High Availability Using FDM"

hostname ftd-ha-primary
NGFW VERSION 7.4.0

interface GigabitEthernet0/0
 nameif OUTSIDE
 security-level 0
 ip address 203.0.113.1 255.255.255.0
!

interface GigabitEthernet0/1
 nameif INSIDE
 security-level 100
 ip address 192.168.1.1 255.255.255.0
!

! Failover configuration
failover
failover link interface GigabitEthernet0/2
failover replicate interface GigabitEthernet0/2
failover polltime unit 1 holdtime 15
failover polltime interface 5 holdtime 25
failover key SecureKey123
!

access-list OUTSIDE-IN extended permit ip any any
access-group OUTSIDE-IN interface OUTSIDE in
